word embeddings.from sentence: We initialize word embeddings with 128 - d vectors and fine - tune them during training .

150 k.for: both the source and target text

vocabulary size.from sentence: The vocabulary size was set to 150 k for both the source and target text .

hidden state size.from sentence: The hidden state size was set to 256 .

models.from sentence: We trained our models on a single GTX TI - TAN GPU machine .

Adagrad optimizer.from sentence: We used the Adagrad optimizer with a batch size of 64 to minimize the loss .

gradient clipping.from sentence: We used gradient clipping with a maximum gradient norm of 2 .

set to.from sentence: The initial learning rate and the accumulator value were set to 0.15 and 0.1 , respectively .

optimization using.from sentence: We trained our concept pointer generator for 450 k iterations yielded the best performance , then took the optimization using RL rewards for RG - L at 95 K iterations on DUC - 2004 and at 50 K iterations on Gigaword .

took.from sentence: We took the distancesupervised training at 5 K iterations on DUC - 2004 and at 6.5 K iterations on Gigaword .
